text: Kamaghɨn amizɨma, gumazamiziba Samuel mɨgei, “E uari, gumazir aruam, e nɨn ingangarir gumazamiziba, e kamaghsua, nɨ e bagh Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨn God, a en apangkuvighsɨ a mɨkɨm, eghtɨ e ovengan kogham. E fo, e arazir kurar avɨribagh ami, e datɨrɨghɨn fo, e arazir kurar igharazir mam gamua, uari bagha atrivim amɨsɨvasa nɨn azara.”
